summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Charles Street, from 20th Avenue South to 21st Avenue South; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 100545 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
